com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster

Class AbstractClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.BaseClusterer
      • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.AbstractClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KMeans, ThresholdClusterer

    public abstract class AbstractClusterer
extends BaseClusterer
    Abstract base class that provides many useful features a typical clusterer needs. Most clusterers will extend this class directly. The only method that is required to be implemented by sub-classes is isCandidate() for determining whether an instance can be added to a cluster during clustering.
    Author:
    slangevin

      • isCandidate

        protected abstract boolean isCandidate(Instance inst,
                  Cluster candidate,
                  double score,
                  Cluster best,
                  double bestScore)
        Method for determining whether a cluster is a better candidate than the previous best candidate cluster.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance being clustered
        candidate - is the cluster
        score - is the double precision value of the distance score of inst to candidate
        best - is the current best cluster the inst can be added to
        bestScore - is the current best score
        Returns:
        true if candidate is a better cluster for inst than best

        public ClusterResult doIncrementalCluster(DataSet ds,
                                 List<Cluster> clusters)
        Description copied from interface: Clusterer
        Cluster the instances in ds using the clusters provided
        Parameters:
        ds - is the DataSet containing the new instances to cluster
        clusters - is the list of clusters to use during clustering
        Returns:
        the list of clusters that were modified

      • doCluster

        public ClusterResult doCluster(DataSet ds)

        Returns:
        the list of clusters created

      • bestCluster

        public AbstractClusterer.DistanceResult bestCluster(Instance inst,
                                           List<List<? extends Instance>> clusterBlocks)
        Public method to find the best cluster for inst to be a member. The method parallelizes the distance calculations between inst and the clusters using the executor service. The cluster that is the best candidate for the inst is returned.
        Parameters:
        inst - is the instance being considered
        clusters - is a collection of clusters to search
        Returns:
        the best cluster

      • doCluster

        protected ClusterResult doCluster(DataSet ds,
                      List<Cluster> clusters)
        Protected method to initiate clustering dataset. The public methods doCluster() and doIncrementalCluster() invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        ds - the data set to cluster
        clusters - is a collection of clusters to modify
        Returns:
        a collection of modified clusters

      • distance

        public double distance(Instance inst1,
              Instance inst2)
        Description copied from interface: Clusterer
        Calculate the distance of the two instances using the distance measures associated with this clusterer.
        Returns:
        a double value representing the distance between inst1 and inst2
